Author: Aireil
Name: FF Logs Viewer
Description: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game. Add a context menu to open someone's logs.
Punchline: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game.
Changelog:
- 2.0.1.0: Add context menu button back, this is currently disabled in Dalamud, but will automatically work once fixed.
- 2.0.3.0: Add all stars points/rank/rank% stats + number of decimal digits setting.
- 2.0.3.1: Add DSR to default layout + fix all star bug with fresh log
